name: Death, submission or revenge
description:
Small interactive fiction that puts you in the shoes of a detective who has to investigate the death of someone close to you.

There are different possible paths, some are more interactive and others are more linear (at least for now).

This is my first interactive fiction published in English, I would appreciate comments giving feedback and corrections if necessary. 

In addition, I would like to add illustrations, so if any artist is interested in doing them, they are more than welcome

You can comment below or contact me through any of my networks.

Portfolio: https://marcosalebuena.wordpress.com/
